pullrequest.title: Logging Part 5: Record ignition transport topics

content.raw:
Windows experienced an internal compiler error (ICE), which literally means we ran into a bug in the MSVC compiler.

I've gotten this branch to build, run, and pass tests on my Windows virtual machine, so I'll go ahead and run the Windows build test again. Hopefully the ICE was just a one-off issue that won't resurface.
content.html:
Windows experienced an internal compiler error (ICE), which literally means we ran into a bug in the MSVC compiler.

I've gotten this branch to build, run, and pass tests on my Windows virtual machine, so I'll go ahead and run the Windows build test again. Hopefully the ICE was just a one-off issue that won't resurface.
